question: 小文字
sourceMnemonic: You know that <ja>文字</ja> means "letters". So, what are "small letters"? That would be <vocabulary>lowercase letters</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic:
This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. However, <ja>小</ja> uses the kun'yomi reading and <ja>文</ja> is an exception here, so here's a mnemonic to help you remember this:

You learned your lowercase letters from <reading><ja>子</ja></reading> <reading>Moe</reading> (<ja>こも</ja>). That's right, after Moe taught you all the letters, his son <ja>子</ja> Moe taught you the lowercase ones. Such teamwork.
